pkgmetadata.longdescription: Numerical Weather Predictions // Access to several Numerical Weather Prediction services both in raster format and as a time series for a location. Currently it works with GFS https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/data-access/model-data/model- datasets/global-forcast-system-gfs, MeteoGalicia https://www.meteogalicia.gal/web/modelos/threddsIndex.action, NAM https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/data-access/model-data/model- datasets/north-american-mesoscale-forecast-system-nam, and RAP https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/data-access/model-data/model- datasets/rapid-refresh-rap.
